Sentencas: In a practical SOFC power generator device, stack stability and durability are the basis of the system's efficiency.
Titulo: Degradation analysis and durability improvement for SOFC 1-cell stack

Sentencas: A typical stack contains fuel cells and interconnects which are connected serially and the fuel and air are fed onto the different sides of the electrodes.
Titulo: Degradation analysis and durability improvement for SOFC 1-cell stack

Sentencas: When degradants happen at the electrodes and interfaces, the stack performance starts to decay and thus affects the system's efficiency.
Titulo: Degradation analysis and durability improvement for SOFC 1-cell stack

Sentencas: In this study, a planar SOFC 1-cell stack was assembled and placed in a test bench to evaluate its durability under a constant working environment.
Titulo: Degradation analysis and durability improvement for SOFC 1-cell stack

Sentencas: Post test was carried out to determine the source of the performance degradation.
Titulo: Degradation analysis and durability improvement for SOFC 1-cell stack

Sentencas: A low-cost and rapid test method was introduced to quantify morphology information of the microstructure, which could have a potential application in future use.
Titulo: Degradation analysis and durability improvement for SOFC 1-cell stack
